long_description: Let's face it. Camping can be miserable when you can't sleep a wink because you're cold and uncomfortable. The Therm-a-Rest NeoAir(TM) Dream sleeping pad lets you bring luxury to the campground. NeoAir Dream pad combines the comfort of the popular DreamTime(TM) pad with the award-winning NeoAir technology to provide comfort that you can easily carry to the campsite. Foam pillow top and plush microfleece cover wrap around the internal NeoAir pad for excellent warmth and padding from the hard ground. Pad has an R-value of 6.0; R-value is the measurement of resistance to the flow of heat through a material; the higher the R-value, the greater the insulation provided. Removable cover is machine washable; inner NeoAir mattress can be used separately on lightweight adventures. Therm-a-Rest NeoAir(TM) Dream sleeping pad includes a stuff sack that doubles as a pump for inflating the pad.
